title: Radio host reveals 'bizarre' and 'odd' encounter with Ashton Kutcher
text:
Australian radio host Katie 'Monty' Dimond has spoken of her 'bizarre' encounter with Hollywood star Ashton Kutcher.

Speaking on The 3pm Pick Up on Monday, Katie recalled interviewing the Two and a Half Men actor at an event in Australia almost ten years ago.

'Ashton was out [here]... and he was really weird,' she began.

'He was really weird': Australian radio host Katie 'Monty' Dimond (pictured) has spoken of her 'bizarre' encounter with Hollywood star Ashton Kutcher almost ten years ago

'What do you mean weird?' responded her co-host Rebecca Judd.

Katie said: 'He was just an odd-bod. This was when he was with [ex-wife] Demi Moore. I remember I was sitting opposite him, thinking, "You're just strange".

'Like, to get a flow of conversation with him was odd. I was thinking, "You're really just a bizarre human from another planet".'

Rebecca suggested that Ashton may have done dozens of press interviews that day and was simply lacking enthusiasm by the time he met Katie.

Awkward! Katie, who met Ashton in 2010, described the actor as an 'odd-bod' and said she struggled to hold a conversation with him. Pictured on October 4 in San Francisco

'Why was he weird?' Katie's co-host Rebecca Judd (pictured) suggested that Ashton may have done dozens of interviews that day and was simply lacking enthusiasm by the time he met her

Katie clarified that Ashton 'wasn't rude' and was actually 'very friendly', but said he came across as 'a bit of a dork' in conversation.

It is believed the meeting occurred almost a decade ago, before Ashton and Demi Moore announced their separation in 2011.

In July 2010, Ashton made a brief visit to Australia to promote the movie Killers.

Strange: Katie clarified that Ashton 'wasn't rude' and was actually 'friendly', but said he came across as 'a bit of a dork' in conversation. Pictured: Ashton and his ex-wife Demi Moore in 2011

His next trip Down Under was in 2012 with actress Mila Kunis, shortly after the pair had begun dating.

Ashton and Mila eventually married in July 2015, and have since welcomed two children together, Dimitri and Wyatt.

The 3pm Pick Up airs on KIIS 101.1 in Melbourne weekdays at 3pm
